text: to the kings of the north in the mountains, in the Arabah south of Chinnereth, in the foothills,11:2 Hebrew Shephelah or lowlands; that is, the western foothills of Judea; also in verse 16 and in Naphoth-dor 11:2 Or in the heights of Dor; Naphoth-dor is a variant of Naphath-dor; see Joshua 12:23. to the west;
